definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
to guard against/to exhort/to admonish or warn/to give up or stop doing sth/Buddhist monastic discipline/ring (for a finger)

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical pathologic characteristics and differential diagnosis of signet-ring cell carcinoma(SRCC) of the breast.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨乳腺印戒细胞癌的病理特点及鉴别诊断要点。

sentences.english: Telomerase was over expression in gastric signet-ring cell carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 端粒酶在胃印戒细胞癌组织内过表达。

sentences.english: Therefore, we have classified the signet-ring cell carcinoma into the mucous type and microcystic type.
sentences.chinese: 由此，我们把胃印戒细胞癌分为粘液型和微囊型两型。

sentences.english: Signet ring cell features were focally seen in 2 cases.
sentences.chinese: 其中有2例还可见灶性的印戒细胞样癌细胞。

sentences.english: About the focal signet ring cells, I favor frozen artifact.
sentences.chinese: 至于局灶性印戒细胞，我认为是冰冻假象。

definition: biopsy/abbr. to 活檢|活检[huo2 jian3]
pinyin: huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2
zu3 zhi1 bao1 jiang1 jun1 bing4

definition: biopsy/abbr. for 活體組織檢查|活体组织检查[huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2]
